items.title: Rapt AI and AMD work to make GPU utilization more efficient
items.description: Rapt AI, a provider of AI-powered AI-workload automation for GPUs and AI accelerators, has teamed with AMD to enhance AI infrastructure.

items.title: Beyond transformers: Nvidia’s MambaVision aims to unlock faster, cheaper enterprise computer vision
items.description: Nvidia is updating its computer vision models with new versions of MambaVision that combine the best of Mamba and transformers to improve efficiency.

items.title: METASCALE improves LLM reasoning with adaptive strategies
items.description: METASCALE uses a three-stage approach to dynamically choose the right reasoning technique for each promblem.
